name: Francis I
JA_events:
Dissolved the Holy Roman Empire after defeat at Austerlitz|
Founded the Austrian Empire from the Habsburg Monarchy|
Served as first president of German Confederation from 1815
JA_relationships:
France, Napoleon I, Son-in-law, img/france/napoleon_i.jpg|
Sicily, Ferdinand I, Father-in-law, img/italy/ferdinand_i.jpg

name: Ferdinand I
JA_events:
Suffered from seizures, hydrocephaly, and speech impediment|
Considered unfit, not allowed to rule independently|
Abdicated during Revolutions of 1848 in favor of nephew
JA_relationships: Sardinia, Victor Emmanuel I, Father-in-law, img/italy/victor_emmanuel_sardinia.jpg

name: Franz Joseph I
JA_events:
Lost claim to Tuscany and Northern Italy|
Lost the leadership of pan-Germany (German Question) to Prussia|
Annexed Bosnia and Herzegovina, precipitating World War I
JA_wars:
Italian Wars of Independence|
Austro-Prussian War, 1866

name: Charles I
JA_events:
Abdicated immediately after the armistice of World War I|
Banished by the Austrian Parliament passing the Habsburg Law|
Attempted to reclaim Hungary, which became a republic
